channel.title: invercargill on niria.in
channel.description: Recent content in invercargill on niria.in

item.title: Again with the Dunedin and the Sunshine
item.description: Yesterday was moderately uneventful, except that when I left the internet cafe there was a massive black cloud obscuring all light, and I eventually got caught in the mother of all downpours. It was great. Thunder, lightening, massive raindrops and rivers instead of streets! I got back to the hostel and was so soaking wet that I put my bag down and ran straight back out again. Fantastic! Today I got offered a lift to invercargill with two swiss chicks.
